comments.en:
Boer Attila (boera at unitbv dot ro) found out that this printer prints when one tweakes the "lxm3200" driver somewhat. His changes are in the "lxm3200-tweaked" driver now, but they are tested only for printing with the black cartridge.

Consumables/Refills: BW cartridge: 17G0050 Color cartridge: 17G0060 $20-$30 per cart
